text:
@JoeBiden Do I have this right? Trump and Flynn were spied on before Trump took office. Then a failed Russia hoax. Right into a failed impeachment. Then on the day Trump’s cleared, #COVID19 hits the US? And George Floyd is killed the day #OBAMAGATE is declassed? 🤔

https://t.co/ejiBaDWqjb
